name: Endless Purgatory
description:
Join the lamb on a journey through purgatory, gathering cult members and trying to ascend as a god. In a world with no more gods, what happens to what's left behind?

Try to make it to 800 meters and 10 followers to make it to the ending!

A game made by Kuro on his own in a month for the 2022 Spooktober Visual Novel Jam.
